externalDocs.description: Spring Boot Actuator Web API Documentation

get.summary: Retrieve company information.
get.description: Company information behind the given company Id is retrieved.

put.description: Replace all company information of the company associated with the given company Id

head.summary: Checks if a company exists for the specified companyId.
head.description: Checks if a company exists for the specified companyId.

200.description: Successfully checked that the companyId is known by Dataland.

404.description: Check was successful. CompanyId is not known by Dataland.

patch.description: Provided fields of the company associated with the given company Id are updated.

get.summary: Retrieve information about the sourceability of datasets
get.description: Retrieve information about the sourceability of datasets by the filters.

post.summary: Adds a dataset with information on sourceability.
post.description: A dataset is added with information on its sourceability.

post.summary: Search in Dataland for meta info about data using multiple filters.
post.description: Meta info about datasets registered by Dataland can be retrieved.

post.summary: Retrieve specific data from the cache store of the backend.
post.description: Data identified by the provided data IDs is retrieved.

200.description: Successfully added data to the private data store.
Successfully added data to the data store.
Successfully added data to the data store.
Successfully added data to the data store.
Successfully added data to the data store.
Successfully added data to the data store.

post.description: The uploaded data point is added to the data store, the generated data id is returned.

200.description: Successfully added data to the data store.

post.summary: Verify data point content against a given data point type.
post.description: The uploaded data point is verified to conform to its specification.

get.summary: Retrieve just the basic information about specific companies.
get.description: The basic information about companies via the provided company name/identifier are retrieved and filtered by countryCode, sector and available framework data. Empty/Unspecified filters are ignored.

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Search string used for substring matching. Must be at least 3 characters after trimming.

post.description: A new company is added using the provided information, the generated company ID is returned.

post.summary: Validate if companies exist based on Identifiers.
post.description: Checks if companies exists based on a list of provided identifiers. Duplicated results are removed.

post.summary: Triggers a forced upload of a dataset as a stored dataset for testing.
Triggers the migration from stored datasets to assembled datasets for all available datasets.
Triggers the migration from stored datasets to assembled datasets.

get.summary: Look up meta info about a specific dataset.
get.description: Meta info about a specific dataset registered by Dataland and identified by its data ID is retrieved.

patch.summary: Update meta data of dataset selectively
patch.description: Provided fields of the meta data with the given dataId are updated.

head.summary: Checks if a dataset is non-sourceable.
head.description: Checks if a specific dataset is non-sourceable.

200.description: Successfully checked that dataset is non-sourceable.

404.description: Successfully checked that dataset is sourceable.

get.summary: Gets the company ID for an identifier of specified type.
get.description: Get the company ID for an identifier of specified type.

200.description: Found a company corresponding the identifier.

404.description: Found no company corresponding the identifier.

head.summary: Checks that an identifier of specified type exists.
head.description: Checks that an identifier of specified type exists.

404.description: Successfully checked that identifier does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve an augmented dataset meta information uploaded by a specific user.
get.description: Retrieve an augmented dataset meta information uploaded by a specific user for the "My Datasets" page.

200.description: Successfully retrieved augmented dataset meta information.

get.summary: Validates if a token is valid
get.description: Validates if a token is valid

get.summary: Search in Dataland for meta info about data.
get.description: Meta info about datasets registered by Dataland can be retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve a map of data point IDs the dataset is composed of to their corresponding technical ID.
get.description: The IDs of the data points contained in the dataset specified are returned as a map of strings to string.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of data point IDs.

get.summary: Checks if any data is available applying the provided filters.
get.description: Checks if any data is available using the given filters and returns the corresponding data dimensions.

200.description: Successfully checked if data is available.

get.summary: Retrieve specific data from the cache store of the backend.
get.description: Data identified by the provided data ID is retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve specific data from the cache store of the backend.
get.description: Data identified by the provided data ID is retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve specific data from the cache store of the backend.
get.description: Data identified by the provided sha256 hash is retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved vsme datasets with meta info.

404.description: Company Id could not be found.

200.description: Successfully retrieved framework datasets with meta info.

404.description: Company Id could not be found.

200.description: Successfully retrieved framework datasets with meta info.

404.description: Company Id could not be found.

404.description: Company Id could not be found.

200.description: Successfully retrieved framework datasets with meta info.

404.description: Company Id could not be found.

200.description: Successfully retrieved framework datasets with meta info.

get.summary: Retrieve data points by ID.
get.description: A data point identified by its ID is retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve meta-information about data points by ID.
get.description: Meta-information about a data point identified by its ID is retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved meta-information about data point.

get.summary: Retrieve subsidiaries.
get.description: Retrieve the IDs of all subsidiaries of a given ultimate parent company.

get.summary: Retrieve company information.
get.description: Company information behind the given company ID is retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieve aggregated data summary for all frameworks
get.description: For each framework retrieves the amount of available reporting periods

get.summary: Get the company IDs of the teaser companies.
get.description: A list of all company IDs that are currently set as teaser companies (accessible without authentication).

get.summary: Retrieve the number of companies satisfying different filters.
get.description: The number of companies via the provided company name/identifier are retrieved and filtered by countryCode, sector and available framework data. Empty/Unspecified filters are ignored.

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Search string used for substring matching. Must be at least 3 characters after trimming.

get.summary: Retrieve specific companies by searching their names and identifiers
get.description: Companies identified via the provided company name/identifier are retrieved

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Search string used for substring matching. Must be at least 3 characters after trimming.

get.summary: Retrieve available distinct values for company search filters
get.description: Distinct values for the parameter countryCode and sector are returned

delete.description: The data is removed from the data store.
